title: 96/426/EC: Commission Decision of 28 June 1996 amending Decision 96/293/EC concerning certain protective measures with regard to fishery products originating in Mauritania (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 June 1996 amending Decision 96/293/EC concerning certain protective measures with regard to fishery products originating in Mauritania (Text with EEA relevance) (96/426/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1 of Decision 96/293/EC is replaced by the following:
'Article 1
Member States shall prohibit the import of bivalve molluscs, echinoderms, tunicates and marine gastropods in whatever form originating in Mauritania.`
Member States shall amend the measures that they apply to imports to comply with this Decision. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
